items.desc: Wiz releases comprehensive coding rules file for safer development practices, providing security guidelines for application development and vulnerability prevention.
Cloud Security Alliance publishes Secure Vibe Coding Guide, empowering citizen developers with essential security best practices and development patterns.
LevelBlue announces acquisition of Trustwave, positioning itself as the largest pure-play managed security services provider in the cybersecurity market.
Critical vulnerabilities CVE-2025-53109 and CVE-2025-53110 discovered in Anthropic's EscapeRoute system, highlighting security risks in AI infrastructure.
Daniel Miessler introduces Substrate, a new security framework for threat detection and incident response automation.
Sophos demonstrates how artificial intelligence can be leveraged to identify cybercrime masterminds through advanced pattern recognition and behavioral analysis.
AWS tutorial demonstrating how to create and manage security team permissions in IAM Identity Center for enhanced cloud security governance.
XBOW secures $75 million Series B funding to advance AI-powered cybersecurity solutions and autonomous threat detection capabilities.
CloudPEASS open-source tool provides comprehensive cloud security assessments across multiple cloud platforms and services.
Microsoft unveils pathway to medical superintelligence through AI diagnostic orchestrator, advancing automated clinical decision support systems.
Arine Healthcare secures $30 million in funding to expand AI-powered clinical decision support and medication management platforms.
JAMA study demonstrates effectiveness of open-source AI models for radiology image analysis and diagnostic support in clinical settings.
Healthcare Advisory guide outlines strategies for proving care cost reduction value to payers through data-driven metrics and outcomes measurement.
Amazon reorganizes healthcare business unit following executive departures, signaling strategic shift in digital health approach.
Hera Fertility launches AI-powered semen analysis platform providing automated insights for male fertility assessment and treatment planning.
Hamel Husain releases comprehensive FAQ guide on AI evaluations, covering best practices and common pitfalls in LLM assessment frameworks.
TELOS demonstrates practical AI implementation patterns for enterprise systems, showcasing real-world deployment strategies and outcomes.
Bellingcat investigates whether large language models have mastered geolocation capabilities, with implications for OSINT and investigative applications.
Educational resource demonstrating how to build large language models from scratch, featuring Qwen3 implementation and training methodologies.
Google DeepMind releases AlphaGenome API, providing programmatic access to advanced genomics analysis and personalized medicine applications.
Senior engineer shares minimalistic AI setup and workflow, featuring practical recommendations for AI tools integration in enterprise development.
Developer recreates complete Stable Diffusion 3.5 model using only PyTorch, demonstrating deep learning implementation techniques.
